Detailed Description

foreward declaration of CIrrOdeGeomRay

This class encapsulates the ODE body. Bodies are dynamic objects in ODE.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bool irr::ode::CIrrOdeBody::dampingChanged (  ) 

This method shows whether or not the damping has changed since the last step. Useful for the (upcoming) IrrOdeNet and IrrOdeRecorder

Returns:
has the damping changed since the last step

void irr::ode::CIrrOdeBody::setIsFastMoving ( bool  b  ) 

Use this method to mark a body as fast moving, e.g. bullets. If a body is marked as "fast moving" a ray will be cast after each step from the old position to the new one so that a detection is done to find out whether or not the body has passed another body in the last step

Parameters:
b fast moving flag
